name: Photostory Deluxe Slideshow
summary: An MVM file is a slideshow created by MAGIX Photostory Deluxe, a Windows application for creating slideshows. It contains the editing steps and links to the original files (images, videos, audio clips, etc.) included in the slideshow. Photostory Deluxe users export and import MVM files from and to .MPH projects to share them with other users.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
